questions.question: This is the first time I ……………………… them.
questions.description: The present perfect is used after this is the first/second etc.

questions.question: Fossil fuels ……………………….. oil and natural gas are not renewable.
questions.description: Such as is used to give examples. You have to start a new sentence with for example or for instance.

questions.question: The boy ....................... walked in right now is my neighbor’s son.
questions.description: When the relative pronoun is the subject of the relative clause, we use who to refer to people.

questions.question: You …………………………….. not disturb him.
questions.description: Had better is used to give strong advice.

questions.question: You ......................... go now.
questions.description: Must is a modal auxiliary. Questions and negatives are made without do.

questions.question: I looked around but I didn’t find …………………………..
questions.description: Not anybody means the same as nobody.

questions.question: None of us ………………………………. English.
questions.description: A singular verb is more common after none.

questions.question: I would ………………………. you went home now.
We should do something before the situation gets …………………………
questions.description: Worse is the comparative form of bad.

questions.question: She passed the test …………………………….. her teacher.
questions.description: Because of is a preposition. It is used before a noun.

questions.question: She cried …………………………… she was in pain.
questions.description: Because is a conjunction it is used to introduce a clause.
